companyInfo.Competitors: Unicon Pharma, Global PharmaTek, Green Key Resources

jobDescription: Interested candidates, please send your updated CV to kiran@starkassociatesllc.com Summary:Ph.D in Biochemistry, Analytical chemistry or related Lifesciences with minimum of 6 years or MS in Biochemistry, Analytical chemistry or related Lifesciences with a minimum of 10 years of industrial experience.Strong technical knowledge and hands-on experience in characterization proteins and biologic molecules using standard protein characterization techniques: Chromatography (SEC, RP, CIEX- HPLC), Electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE, CE-SDS, cIEF), Mass spec for intact protein analysis and peptide mapping (LC-MS and MALDI) and Circular dichroism and DSC analysis. Knowledge of using Agilent HPLC work stations and Thermo LC-MS equipment.Experience in method development, method qualifications and Validations and writing protocols and reports.Should have strong organizational and presentation skills and can handle multiple projects. Able to lead projects and guide and support junior staff.Strong data analysis and troubleshooting skills. Able to work independently and in a team environment.Experience in working in a GMP environment and documentation and FDA, ICH guidelines.
